maya/beastmayaplugin/include/beastwrappers/beastinstancewrapper.h
/*

#ifndef BEAST_INSTANCE_WRAPPER_H
#define BEAST_INSTANCE_WRAPPER_H

#include "beastwrappers/beastfundamentalswrapper.h"
#include <beastapi/beastinstance.h>
#include <vector>

namespace beastmaya {

class BeastInstance : public BeastObject<ILBInstanceHandle> {
public:
        BeastInstance(ILBInstanceHandle h, bool persistent = false) : BeastObject<ILBInstanceHandle>(h), m_persistent(persistent) {
        }

        ~BeastInstance();

        void setPersistent(bool persistent);
        void setTransform(const ILBMatrix4x4& transform);
        void setMotionTransforms(const std::vector<ILBMatrix4x4>& transforms);
        void setRenderStats(ILBRenderStatsMask stats, bool enable);
        void setInstanceMesh(BeastMesh& mesh);
        void setMaterialOverride(BeastMaterialPtr material);

private:
        bool m_persistent;
};

}

#endif // BEAST_INSTANCE_WRAPPER_H
